021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.core.menu.MyBalMenu;
023import net.tnemc.core.menu.handlers.AmountSelectionHandler;
024import net.tnemc.core.menu.page.shared.AmountSelectionPage;
025import net.tnemc.item.providers.SkullProfile;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
027import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
028import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
029import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
033
034import java.math.BigDecimal;
035import java.util.Collections;
036import java.util.Optional;
037import java.util.UUID;
038import java.util.function.Consumer;
039
040/**
041 * MyBalAmountSelectionPage
042 *
043 * @author creatorfromhell
044 * @since 0.1.3.0
045 */
046public class MyBalAmountSelectionPage extends AmountSelectionPage {
047
048  public MyBalAmountSelectionPage(final String amtID, final String returnMenu, final String menuName, final int menuPage,
049                                  final int returnPage, final Consumer<AmountSelectionHandler> selectionListener) {
050
051    super(amtID, returnMenu, menuName, menuPage, returnPage, selectionListener);
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
056
057    super.handle(callback);
058
059    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
060    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
061
062      final UUID viewerID = viewer.get().uuid();
063
064      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
065                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyBal.AmountSelect.MaxDisplay"), viewerID))
066                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyBal.AmountSelect.Max"), viewerID))))
067                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
068                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, ((BigDecimal)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(MyBalMenu.ACTION_MAX_HOLDINGS, BigDecimal.ZERO))))
069                                         .withSlot(31)
070                                         .build());
071
072      final Optional<Object> name = viewer.get().findData(MyBalMenu.ACTION_ACCOUNT_ID + "_NAME");
073      final Optional<Object> id = viewer.get().findData(MyBalMenu.ACTION_ACCOUNT_ID + "_ID");
074      if(name.isPresent() && id.isPresent()) {
075
076        SkullProfile profile = null;
077        try {
078
079          final UUID account = UUID.fromString((String)id.get());
080          profile = new SkullProfile();
081
082          if(PluginCore.server().playedBefore(account)) {
083            profile.uuid(account);
084          }
085
086        } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
087
088        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PLAYER_HEAD", 1)
089                                                           .customName(Component.text((String)name.get()))
090                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyBal.AmountSelect.Player"), viewerID)))
091                                                           .profile(profile))
092                                           .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
093                                           .withSlot(13)
094                                           .build());
095      }
096    }
097  }
098}
